name: Clicker Script
description: Clicker Script finds its inspiration from RCA Records Stereo Action Series from the 1960's. This signature elegant yet slightly bouncy script truly sings, and lends a happy go lucky flavor to any design. Designed by Brian J. Bonislawsky and Jim Lyles for Astigmatic (AOETI). To contribute to the project contact Brian J. Bonislawsky .
author: Astigmatic
